description: '''Adam Mark Crisp''' (born c. 1985), known by the [[stage name]] '''Clarence Clarity''', is an English singer, songwriter, producer and musician. He has been praised for his unique, eclectic pop sound which was described by ''[[The Guardian]]'' as "funk played by a swarm of bees". In addition to his own music he has produced for acts including [[Rina Sawayama]], [[Dorian Electra]], and [[Sundara Karma]].
